Interface EngineRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
EngineDB, EngineFileTextStore, EngineInMemoryStore
public interface EngineRepository
Interface for managing engine records in various storage systems. This interface defines the necessary methods for CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on engine records, allowing different implementations (e.g., in-memory, file-based, database).

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      List<Engine> getAll() throws Exception
      Retrieves all engine records from the storage.
      Returns:
      a List of Engine objects.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during retrieval.

    • add

      void add(Engine e) throws Exception
      Adds a new engine record to the storage.
      Parameters:
      e - the Engine object to be added.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the addition.

    • update

      void update(Engine e) throws Exception
      Updates an existing engine record in the storage.
      Parameters:
      e - the Engine object containing updated information.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the update.

    • save

      void save(List<Engine> e) throws Exception
      Saves a list of engine records to the storage.
      Parameters:
      e - the List of Engine objects to save.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the save operation.

    • displayEnginesFromBinFile

      List<Engine> displayEnginesFromBinFile(String filename) throws Exception
      Displays engine records from a binary file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the binary file to read from.
      Returns:
      a List of Engine objects read from the file.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during file reading.

    • delete

      void delete(int id) throws Exception
      Deletes an engine record from the storage by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the engine to delete.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the deletion.
